backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing appointment booking system with functions to book, retrieve all, cancel, and search appointments by service type, storing appointments in a Map with auto-incrementing IDs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features: DoctorsSection component creation, its integration into HomePage, HeroSection background image update, ServicesSection imagery additions, and WhyChooseUsSection photo gallery.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing routing setup, layout components, page components, sections, forms, hooks, and styling configuration for the dental care application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark mode color schemes using OKLCH color space, including healthcare-themed design tokens for backgrounds, borders, and UI elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with basic meta tags, 'Dental Care' title, root div for React mounting, and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, booking, and service detail pages, wrapped with QueryClientProvider and Toaster for global state and notifications.
Appointment booking form component with react-hook-form validation, service selection dropdown, date/time pickers, backend mutation integration via useActor hook, and success/error toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact information section displaying clinic location, phone, email, hours in card format with icons, plus WhatsApp button and embedded Google Maps iframe in two-column responsive layout.
frontend/src/components/DoctorsSection.t: Component displaying three dental professionals (Dr. Anas Jadla, Dr. Farhan Bangra, Dr. Jainul Aabedin) in profile cards with avatars, names, specializations, and hover effects in responsive grid.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying clinic branding, contact information (phone, email, WhatsApp), business hours, quick links, and copyright notice in a three-column grid layout.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with logo, navigation menu (desktop and mobile), active section highlighting based on scroll position, phone number display, and a "Book Appointment" button.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with background image, overlay gradient, headline text about dental care, and two CTA buttons for booking appointments and contacting the clinic.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component that wraps pages with Header, main content area (Outlet), and Footer in a flex column structure.
Services section displaying six dental service cards (checkup, root canal, implants, whitening, braces, pediatric) in a responsive grid with icons, images, descriptions, and links to detailed service pages.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialsSect: Testimonials carousel displaying patient reviews with avatars, star ratings, and text feedback, showing a 4.9/5 Google rating summary.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseUsSecti: Section highlighting four key features (expert doctors, modern technology, emergency care, affordable pricing) with icons, plus a photo gallery showcasing clinic facilities in a three-column grid.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and context provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching appointments data: useGetAllAppointments retrieves all appointments and useSearchAppointmentsByService filters by service type.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom healthcare-themed color scheme in OKLCH format for both light and dark modes, plus base typography styles for headings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root component wrapped with QueryClientProvider for React Query and InternetIdentityProvider for ICP authentication.
frontend/src/pages/BookingPage.tsx: Appointment booking page component displaying a back button and centered AppointmentForm with introductory text.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page component that renders six sections: Hero, Services, WhyChooseUs, Doctors, Testimonials, and Contact.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetailPage.tsx: Service detail page displaying comprehensive information about dental services including descriptions, procedures, benefits, duration, and special features with service-specific icons and colors.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with custom OKLCH color system, extended typography, container settings, custom shadows, and animation keyframes for accordion and fade effects.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining a dental hospital website with US English content, architectural notes about responsive design, API integrations, service detail pages, and required professional dental imagery.
